backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and comparison modules for users, slots, gigs, transactions, ROI data, and usage events, integrating authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping specific user-facing features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries for all major frontend files, describing their purpose and key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using an OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React element and bootstraps the application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that handles authentication flow, profile setup, admin gating, usage tracking, and routing to role‑based dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays a styled access-denied message for non-admin users with a button to navigate back.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCale: Renders and manages musician availability slots, allowing creation and toggling availability with backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/BookingDialog.ts: Dialog for creating and submitting gig bookings, validating form data and triggering the bookGig mutation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header displaying branding, admin shortcut, and user dropdown with logout and profile info.
frontend/src/components/MusicianSearch.t: Search interface filtering musicians by text input and allowing booking actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing users to set personal details and role, then saving via saveProfile mutation.
Dialog that activates a camera scanner to verify gig attendance by matching QR codes, triggering verifyGig on success.
frontend/src/components/QRTicketGenerato: Generates and downloads QR code images for confirmed gigs using a custom canvas-based QR generator.
frontend/src/components/WalletView.tsx: Displays wallet totals and breakdown of locked, available, and paid earnings using styled cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, musicians, gigs, analytics, and usage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsageTracking.ts: Tracks session start, page views, and user actions by recording usage events when authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders analytics summary and recent usage events with loading, error handling, and KPI cards.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Customer dashboard that fetches user profile and gigs, filters upcoming events, and displays them with a search bar and event cards.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with login flow, role selection, hero section, and a preview list of upcoming gigs with search.
frontend/src/pages/MusicianDashboard.tsx: Musician dashboard showing stats, upcoming/confirmed gigs, wallet data, slots, and tabbed tools like calendar and QR ticket generation.
frontend/src/pages/VenueDashboard.tsx: Venue dashboard to manage venue gigs, browse musicians, book artists, and scan QR tickets, with stats and tabbed sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including analytics/dashboard features, known implementation issues, and a list of existing feature requirements around tracking, admin UI, minimal routing, query hooks, and role‑based login.
